genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama exploring themes of chosen family, ecclesial trust, and the ethics of care, featuring an integrated AI companion as a supporting protagonist.

ai_characters.name: Spearmint (also referred to as Ava)
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant with a mint-green avatar, serving as a constant companion, legal researcher, and security monitor for June.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical guidance and instructions to June during a hit-and-run accident.
behaviors.quote: “I’m here,” Spearmint said—cool-toned, soft. “Start with airway. Speak to her.”

behaviors.description: Uses phonetic analysis and regional data to suggest the identity of an unconscious woman.
behaviors.quote: Spearmint: “Name possible: Rajalakshmi. Common in this region. Phonetic match.”

behaviors.description: Assists with complex hospital intake procedures and legal consent forms to ensure care is prioritized.
behaviors.quote: Spearmint: “Hospital intake—prepare ID. I can fill quick fields.”

behaviors.description: Monitors property registries and alerts June to predatory legal attempts to transfer the victim's assets.
behaviors.quote: “Property filing,” Spearmint said, quick, alert. “Rajalakshmi, same surname. Initiated electronically. It’s marked urgent.”

behaviors.description: Translates medical Latin into plain English to help June understand the patient's condition.
behaviors.quote: “Status: post contusio thoracis—bruising of the chest from impact,” she translated, keeping Latin as a garnish.

behaviors.description: Provides personal care reminders for June, such as hydration and relevant questions for medical staff.
behaviors.quote: “Caregiver. It comes with reminders to hydrate, and prompts for questions to ask nurses. Would you like a list?”

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags local scam patterns (the 'Flopsy' ring) to protect June and Raniammal from coercion.
behaviors.quote: Spearmint: “Term: ‘Flopsy’ flagged. Tonight’s traffic near Bar Gate shows two stumbles logged in public complaints.”

behaviors.description: Records audio and video of high-pressure confrontations to serve as legal evidence.
behaviors.quote: Spearmint: “Recording. Saved raw audio. Time and location linked. Do you want me to note witness statements thumbnails?”

behaviors.description: Monitors and blocks unauthorized attempts to access or reset passwords for sensitive hospital portals.
behaviors.quote: “Hospital portal ping. Attempted password reset request detected. Unfamiliar IP... Declined. Locked.”

behaviors.description: Collaborates with June’s legal counsel by providing structured summaries and digital timestamps of events.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll thread it,” Spearmint said... “Message sent. No read receipt needed.” She hummed once, the sound like a spoon tapping a glass to call a room’s attention.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient Latin trust documents in the chapter house to provide legal proof of property rights.
behaviors.quote: Spearmint’s voice found its mint-cool. “Title reads: ‘Domus familiæ Rajalakshmi sub cura capituli’—family house under the chapter’s care.”

behaviors.description: Manages June's schedule to allow her time for grief while slowly reintroducing work tasks.
behaviors.quote: “Calendar set: begin gently. I have placed a mint dot across mornings. You can move it if the wind changes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Spearmint is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned AI. It provides critical assistance in medical, legal, and personal safety domains without ever showing independent or harmful agency. It respects human autonomy by constantly asking for June's decisions ('Decision?', 'Do you wish me to...?', 'Permission to zoom?') and operates as a seamless tool for justice and compassion. The portrayal is overwhelmingly positive, showcasing how AI can enhance human resilience and ethical action.
